page.title: 15THE 7TH BLACKPOOL SCOUTS
page.content: {The 7th.Blackpool Scouts}meet in St. Paul's Church Hall,Marton.Most of the troop live in the Marton area.Their ages range from 11 to 15.Their knecker-chief is purple,gold and green in colour. They undertake various activities associated with Scouting including camping and hiking as well as other more social events and trips such as a visit to Alton Towers. The troop have been involved in several parades during the year including a Parish parade and a review of all Blackpool Scouts by the Mayor and Mayoress. They have also been involved in to foreign visits during the year to Italy and to Germany. The Hall in which they meet is also used by Guides,Brownies and Cub Scouts as well as other Church organisations.
